tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    date_submitted DATE
)

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
  feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id UUID,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  review_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE MarketingContent (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_text TEXT,
    target_audience TEXT,
    publish_date DATE,
    feedback_id INT,
    feedback_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE MobileMarketing (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    content_id INT,
    total_clicks INT
)

CREATE TABLE ReviewAnalysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    positive_reviews INT,
    neutral_reviews INT,
    negative_reviews INT,
    analysis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE CampaignPerformance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    total_clicks INT,
    conversion_rate DECIMAL
)
